overview.en: BV is dedicated to build a value discovery platform for trading platform, blockchain enterprises and investors, and build a digital blockchain media leading the world. BV is different from other cryptocurrency or digital token. BV won’t have ICO, but ecologically encourage blockchain information APP in BV project. Users with BV can obtain more service contents from the APP. The holders of BV can be compensated based on the profitability of the team.
overview.zh: BV致力于打造连接交易平台、区块链企业、投资者的价值发现平台。致力于打造全球领先的区块链数字媒体。BV与其它加密货币或数字代币不同，BV不会进行初始币（ICO）发行,而是使用BV项目旗下区块链资讯APP进行生态激励。拥有BV的用户可以得到APP更多服务内容，并根据团队的营利能力，持续对持币用户给予补偿。
